resources.string: Scientific tests and a complex algorithm to uncover a child\'s true potential and match their passion and strengths to the right career and education path.
All researched and converted into guide books validated by industry practitioners.
On 200+ colleges, 100+ exams, 100+ special courses, and 15 of India\'s best tutorials.
Every child gets 3 one-to-one sessions to find a true career path.
From career, stream and electives to exams, tutorials and college.

Scenario: Suppose, a child expresses interest in clothing and fashion. The traditional career route is considered to be fashion design. However, there are many more career options available – with each of them requiring a unique education pathway. Let’s explore this example in detail:

Hold on! Interest in clothing and fashion could mean: 

FASHION TECHNOLOGY 
FASHION DESIGN 
TEXTILE ENGINEERING 
FASHION BUSINESS MANAGEMENT

FASHION TECHNOLOGY
(Requires science and clearing the NIFT Aptitude Test)

FASHION DESIGN 
(Requires Arts and clearing Design Aptitude Test to enter institutes like NID)

TEXTILE ENGINEERING
(Requires Science and clearing CET)

FASHION BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
(Requires for commerce and training for MBA)

After considering mutiple criteria, we can now help parent and children decide

OCCUPATION: Fashion Technologist

STREAM AND ELECTIVE: Science with Maths

EXAM: NIFT Aptitute Test

INSTITUTE:NIFT

TUTORIAL:Arkin
